answers.author: Melvin
answers.body: well melvin we like dogs because they are fun and cute

0.body: like seriously, just big metal tubes that can stay in the air so long as they have fuel.  That's not natural.
0.title: Why do airplanes stay up?

-Kg0N5xd7MibLqoSnST3.body: They're so much work, they smell and destroy your house.  They're also so clingy and needy you and people constantly refuse to discipline their dogs.  Just why?
-Kg0N5xd7MibLqoSnST3.title: Why do we like dogs?
